page.title: 17Celebrations in Alton(1)
page.content: On Christmas Day we go to our relatives' house.My grandad dresses up as Father Christmas and gives out presents.We play a game and the winner opens his present first.We have a cake with fifty pence pieces baked in it.We play such games as Bob the Apple and Blindman's Buff. On Shrove Tuesday we cook pancakes and toss them.Some people eat them with lemon and sugar,we put honey and nuts on ours.The whole family like pancakes,so we have lots. We celebrate Easter and Christmas. We go to church once on Good Friday and twice on Easter Sunday.Which ever day Christmas is on,we go to church. The whole of my family are Christians.
